name: Free Bird Travel Bern
description:
The
capital city of Switzerland also called as dreamland is adorably built around
the crook of Aare River. In this tour we explore the most famous tourist places
such as Zentrum Paul Klee, Bern Historical Museum, The Federal Palace, The
Bärengraben, The Zytglogge Tower, The Bern Minster, Nydeggkirche, The Swiss
Alpine Museum, The Museum of Fine Arts Bern, The Kindlifresserbrunnen, The
Natural History Museum, The Gurten, The Church of the Holy Ghost, The Käfigturm
, The Rosengarten Bern and The Kunsthalle Bern.
